name: Product Pricing Table by WooBeWoo
author: woobewoo

sections.description:
Product Pricing Table plugin by WooBeWoo is a best tool for making your goods to look in a favorable light. Colorful and compact tables will bring novelty to your site, and let you show your products benefits to your clients. The only thing they need to do is to compare products, choose your best offer and click on “PURCHASE” button! Just couple of quick steps – pick product pricing table template, add content and you’re ready with your first table.
It’s never been so easy to create and manage pricing and comparison tables . User friendly table builder was created by our coders to make the plugin easy-in-use as for skilled developers, as for people without any programming skills. Your comparison table can be customized from head to toe via special interface, or you can use built-in CSS Editor if you have some CSS knowledges.

Pricing Table Features

  • User-friendly table builder
    Every piece of table has its own editor to customize.
  • Templates to choose from
    Different presets for every taste.
  • Automated Woo product uploader
    Just one click – and your products are in a table content
  • Preset product properties
    List of the most useful features of goods to compare at
  • Unlimited Rows and Columns
    Create as big tables, as your server can handle – our plugin doesn’t have any limitations on amounts
  • Description Column, Header and Footer Rows
    Add main components of table to make its content well structured
  • Responsive mode
    No more broken price tables on mobile devices – enable responsivity, and your columns will be shown one below each other
  • Text and Background Color Settings
    Pick any color from the palette for every element of table
  • Various Fonts
    List overloaded with different font styles
  • Built-in CSS Editor
    An ability for advanced users of CSS to show skill in table editing
  • Tables Export/Import
    Migrate your tables with just one click via special intuitive-clear functional
  • Adding images, videos and icons
    Fulfill your table with visual elements to make customers interested in your product – just in few minutes
sections.installation:
a) VIA FTP
Download zip archive with plugin
Extract files
Copy the folder with plugin
Open via ftp folder \wp-content\plugins\
Paste plugin folder into here
Go to admin panel => Plugins => press activate

B) DIRECT UPLOAD VIA ADMIN AREA
Download zip archive with plugin
Go to admin panel => Plugins => Add new
Choose the archive with plugin and upload it
Wait until you get the notification installation went successfully
Press Activate button

C) VIA WORDPRESS REPOSITORY
Navigate to admin panel => Plugins => Add new
Type “Woocommerce Pricing Table by WooBeWoo” in the search field
Choose our plugin from the list and click “Install”
Wait until you get the notification installation went successfully
Press Activate button

Video tutorial how to set up WooCommerce Pricing Table by WooBeWoo
sections.faq:
How to create first table?

You can follow tutorial on getting started with Price Tables Plugin

How to set up your Pricing Table

Here you can find all main settings of our WooCommerce Product Pricing Tables

My Product Pricing Table Plugin is not working. Why?

If you have problems with the work of plugin or something is not working as it should, first follow this follow steps:
*Test the plugin with a WordPress default theme, to be sure that the error is not caused by the theme you are currently using.
*Deactivate all plugins you are using and check if the problem is still occurring.
*Ensure that you plugin version, your theme version and your WordPress are updated and the problem has not already been solved in a later plugin update.
If none of the this advises help you, contact us via support form on our website and describe your problem.

How can I translate a plugin?

We are always ready to collaborate with our users to widen the auditory! Please, read [this article] (http://woobewoo.com/documentation/translation/) if you’d like to translate the plugin and get the PRO version as a reward!
